name: Bomber Surviver
description:
Delay your fate!

Try to live as long as possible! Every second the game is getting harder.

Here are a few rules that will help you succeed in our game:

  • Explode monsters with bombs and collect experience crystals from them to level up
  • Use bombs with different effects
  • Every minute a big boss appears, and will leave behind a valuable chest.

Controls: mouse/keyboard

  • WASD - movement
  • 1, 2, 3, 4 - select bomb
  • Right Mouse - throw bomb
  • Left Mouse - kick something
  • Scroll Mouse - zoom camera

Hyper Active Lazy Seals team has prepared this game specifically for the Ludum Dare Extra format.

  • Anton Prozin - gamedesign, Lead
  • Ilya Grigorev - code
  • Tanya Davydova - code
  • Denis Demyanov - art, animations
  • MoreHope - art, UI
  • Vladimir Okunev - Sfx
  • Vyacheslav Urzumov - background music

We tried to make the game as simple as possible, but at the same time with a challenge. Write in the comments how long you managed to hold out. 

p.s Sorry for your FPS.
